headline: LOS ANGELES LAKERS GAMES ON SPECTRUM FRONT ROW™ IN APPLE IMMERSIVE TIP OFF JANUARY 9
summary: Spectrum and Apple today unveiled the schedule for Spectrum Front Row™ in Apple Immersive, which will feature a series of live basketball games in a revolutionary storytelling format on Apple Vision Pro. Beginning this Friday, January 9, Apple Vision Pro users in the Lakers' regional broadcast territory — Southern California, Hawaii, and parts of southern Nevada, including Las Vegas — will be able to watch select 2026 Lakers games live in Apple Immersive through the new Spectrum SportsNet app, o

headline: ShowSeeker and Innovar Solutions Combine to Reimagine Ad Sales Management
summary: ShowSeeker, the ad tech company behind Pilot®, a cloud-based campaign and order management platform, today announced that it has combined with Innovar Solutions, an operational improvement firm known for bringing transformative processes and systems to the media and advertising industry.

raw.headline: ShowSeeker and Innovar Solutions Combine to Reimagine Ad Sales Management
raw.summary: ShowSeeker, the ad tech company behind Pilot®, a cloud-based campaign and order management platform, today announced that it has combined with Innovar Solutions, an operational improvement firm known for bringing transformative processes and systems to the media and advertising industry.

headline: AT&T Stock Had a Miserable 2025. Why This Analyst Says 2026 Will Be Better.
summary: KeyBanc analyst Brandon Nispel expects the wireless carrier to beat rivals Verizon and T-Mobile in the race for convergence.
